Verses: 1 karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Avargal Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Parisuththa Sthalaththil Aaraadhanai Seygiradharku Vendiya Vasthirangalaiyum, Aaronukkup Parisuththa Vasthirangalaiyum Seydhaargal.
2 epoththaip Ponninaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seydhaan.

3 andhap Ponnai, Ilaneelanoolodum Raththaambaranoolodum Sivappunoolodum Melliya Panjunoolodum Serththu Visiththiravelaiyaai Neyyumbadikku, Melliya Thagadugalaai Adiththu, Avaigalaich Sarikaigalaagappanninaargal.
4 irandu Tholgalinmelulla Adhin Irandu Munaigalaiyum Serththaargal; Adhu Ondraai Inaikkappattirundhadhu.

5 andha Epoththin Melirukkum Visiththiramaana Kachchai, Andha Velaikku Oppaagave Ponninaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum, Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Seyyappattadhu.
6 isravel Puththirarin Naamangalai Muththirai Vettuvelaiyaagak Komedhagak Karkalil Vetti, Avaigalaip Pon Kuvalaigalil Padhiththaargal.
7 karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Avaigal Isravel Puththiraraikkuriththu Gnaabakakkurik Karkalaayirukkumbadi Epoththuth Tholgalinmel Avaigalai Vaiththaan.
8 maarppadhakkaththai Epoththin Velaikku Oththa Visiththiravelaiyaagap Ponninaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seydhaan.
9 andha Maarppadhakkaththaich Sadhuramum Irattaiyumaaich Seydhu, Oru Jaan Neelamum Oru Jaan Agalamumaakki,
10 adhile Naalu Paththi Raththinakkargalaip Padhiththaargal; Mudhalaam Paththi Padhmaraagamum Pushparaagamum Maanikkamum,
11 irandaam Paththi Maragadhamum Indhiraneelamum Vachchiramum,
12 moondraam Paththi Kempum Vaitooriyamum Sukandhiyum,
13 naalaam Paththi Patikappachchaiyum Komedhakamum Yaspiyumaanadhu. Avaigal Andhandha Idangalile Ponguvalaigalil Padhikkappattirundhadhu.

14 indhak Karkal Isravel Puththirarudaiya Naamangalinbadiye Pannirandum, Avargaludaiya Naamangalullavaigalumaayirundhadhu; Pannirandu Koththirangalil Ovvoru Koththiraththin Naamam Ovvondrilum Muththirai Vettaai Vettiyirundhadhu.
15 maarppadhakkaththukku Adhin Pakkangalile Pinnal Velaiyaana Pasumpon Sangiligalaiyum Panni,
16 irandu Pon Kuvalaigalaiyum Irandu Pon Valaiyangalaiyum Seydhu, Andha Irandu Valaiyangalai Maarppadhakkaththin Irandu Pakkaththilum Vaiththu,
17 ponninaal Seydha Pinnal Velaiyaana Andha Irandu Sangiligalaiyum Maarppadhakkaththin Pakkangalil Irukkira Irandu Valaiyangalilum Maatti,
18 pinnal Velaiyaana Avvirandu Sangiligalin Irandu Nunigalaiyum Epoththin Tholpuraththuth Thundugal Mel Munpuraththil Irukkira Irandu Kuvalaigalilum Maattinaargal.
19 pinnum Irandu Valaiyangalaip Panni, Avaigalai Epoththin Keezhppuraththirku Edhiraana Maarppadhakkaththin Matra Irandu Pakkangalilum Adhin Oraththil Vaiththu,
20 vere Irandu Pon Valaiyangalaiyum Panni, Avaigalai Epoththin Munpuraththin Irandu Keezhppakkangalil Adhin Inaippukku Edhiraagavum, Epoththin Visiththiramaana Kachchaikku Melaagavum Vaiththu,

21 maarppadhakkam Epoththin Visiththiramaana Kachchaikku Melaaga Irukkumbadikkum, Epoththilirundhu Neengip Pogaadhabadikkum, Adhai Adhin Valaiyangalaal Epoththin Valaiyangalode Ilaneela Naadaavinaale, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Kattinaargal.
22 epoththin Keezh Angiyai Muzhuvadhum Ilaneelanoolaal Neydhaan.
23 angiyin Naduvil Maarkkavasath Thuvaaraththukku Oppaaga Oru Thuvaaramum, Adhu Kizhiyaadhabadi Andhath Thuvaaraththaich Sutrilum Oru Naadaavum Thaiththirundhadhu.
24 angiyin Keezh Orangalil Thongaththakkadhaagath Thiriththa Ilaneelanoolum Raththaambaranoolum Sivappunoolumaana Velaiyaaga Maadhalampazhangalaip Panni,
25 pasumponninaal Manigalaiyum Panni, Andha Manigalai Angiyin Orangalil Sutrilum Maadhalampazhangalin Idaiidaiye Thongavaiththaargal.
26 karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye Aaraadhanaikkuriya Angiyin Oraththaich Sutrilum, Oru Maniyum Oru Maadhalampazhamum, Oru Maniyum Oru Maadhalampazhamumaai Irundhadhu.
27 aaronukkum Avan Kumaararukkum Melliya Panjunoolaal Nesavuvelaiyaana Angigalaiyum,
28 melliya Panjunoolaal Paakaiyaiyum, Alangaaramaana Kullaakkalaiyum, Thiriththa Melliya Sanalnoolaal Sallatangalaiyum,
29 thiriththa Melliya Panjunoolaalum Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Siththirath Thaiyalvelaiyaana Idaikkachchaiyaiyum, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Seydhaargal.
30 parisuththa Kireedaththin Pattaththaiyum Pasumponninaale Panni, Karththarukkup Parisuththam Ennum Ezhuththukkalai Adhile Muththirai Vettaaga Vetti,
31 adhai Uyarap Paakaiyinmel Kattumbadi, Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiye, Ilaneela Naadaavinaal Kattinaargal.
32 ippadiye Aasarippuk Koodaaramaagiya Vaasasthalaththin Velaiyellaam Mudindhadhu; Karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiyellaam Isravel Puththirar Seydhaargal.

33 pinbu, Vaasasthalaththai Moseyinidaththil Konduvandhaargal; Koodaaraththaiyum, Adharkuriya Ellaap Panimuttugalaiyum, Adhin Thuradugalaiyum, Adhin Palagaigalaiyum, Adhin Thaazhppaalgalaiyum, Adhin Thoongalaiyum, Adhin Paadhangalaiyum,
34 sivappuththeerndha Aattukkadaath Thol Moodiyaiyum, Thagasuththol Moodiyaiyum, Maraivin Thiraichcheelaiyaiyum,
35 saatchippettiyaiyum, Adhin Thandugalaiyum, Kirubaasanaththaiyum,
36 mejaiyaiyum, Adhin Ellaap Panimuttugalaiyum, Samugaththappangalaiyum,
37 suththamaana Kuththuvilakkaiyum, Varisaiyaai Ozhungupaduththappatta Adhin Agalgalaiyum, Adhin Ellaap Panimuttugalaiyum, Velichchaththirku Enneyaiyum,
38 porpeedaththaiyum, Abishega Thailaththaiyum, Sugandha Thoobavarkkaththaiyum, Vaasasthalaththin Vaasal Thongudhiraiyaiyum,
39 vengalap Balibeedaththaiyum, Adhin Vengalach Sallataiyaiyum, Adhin Thandugalaiyum, Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Thottiyaiyum, Adhin Paadhaththaiyum,

40 piraagaaraththin Thongudhiraigalaiyum, Adhin Thoongalaiyum, Adhin Paadhangalaiyum, Piraagaaraththu Vaasal Maraivaiyum, Adhin Kayirugalaiyum, Adhan Mulaigalaiyum, Aasarippuk Koodaaramaana Vaasasthalaththin Velaikkatuththa Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum,
41 parisuththa Sthalaththile Seyyum Aaraadhanaikkaduththa Vasthirangalaiyum, Aasaariya Oozhiyanjeygira Aaronin Parisuththa Vasthirangalaiyum, Avan Kumaararin Vasthirangalaiyum Konduvandhaargal.
42 karththar Mosekkuk Karpiththapadiyellaam Isravel Puththirar Sagala Velaigalaiyum Seydhaargal.
43 mose Andha Velaigalaiyellaam Paarththaan; Karththar Karpiththapadiye Adhaich Seydhirundhaargal. Mose Avargalai Aaseervadhiththaan.
